cnd22:2.8: **Piṅgiyo**ti tassa therassa nāmaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpoti—
cnd22:3.1: **Yathāddakkhi tathākkhāsī**ti yathā addakkhi tathā akkhāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīakāsi pakāsesi.
cnd22:3.2: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti yathā addakkhi tathā akkhāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīakāsi pakāsesi.
cnd22:3.5: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti yathā addakkhi tathā akkhāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīakāsi pakāsesīti—
cnd22:4.2: **Vimalo**ti rāgo malaṃ, doso malaṃ, moho malaṃ, kodho …
cnd22:4.4: Te malā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd22:4.5: Amalo buddho vimalo nimmalo malāpagato malavippahīno malavimutto sabbamalavītivatto.
cnd22:4.7: Bhagavā tāya pathavisamāya paññāya vipulāya vitthatāya samannāgato.
cnd22:4.9: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.
cnd22:4.10: Bhagavā imāya medhāya paññāya upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato, tasmā buddho sumedhasoti—
cnd22:5.6: Buddhassa bhagavato vatthukāmā pariññātā kilesakāmā pahīnā vatthukāmānaṃ pariññātattā kilesakāmānaṃ pahīnattā.
cnd22:5.7: Bhagavā na kāme kāmeti na kāme icchati na kāme pattheti na kāme piheti na kāme abhijappati.
cnd22:5.8: Ye kāme kāmenti kāme icchanti kāme patthenti kāme pihenti kāme abhijappanti te kāmakāmino rāgarāgino saññasaññino.
cnd22:5.9: Bhagavā na kāme kāmeti na kāme icchati na kāme pattheti na kāme piheti na kāme abhijappati.
cnd22:5.10: Tasmā buddho akāmo nikkāmo cattakāmo vantakāmo muttakāmo pahīnakāmo paṭinissaṭṭhakāmo vītarāgo vigatarāgo cattarāgo vantarāgo muttarāgo pahīnarāgo paṭinissaṭṭharāgo nicchāto nibbuto sītibhūto sukhappaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharatīti—
cnd22:6.1: **Nibbano**ti rāgo vanaṃ, doso vanaṃ, moho vanaṃ, kodho vanaṃ, upanāho vanaṃ …pe…
cnd22:6.3: Te vanā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd22:6.4: Tasmā buddho avano vivano nibbano vanāpagato vanavippahīno vanavimutto sabbavanavītivattoti—
cnd22:6.7: bhagavā āguṃ na karotīti nāgo, na gacchatīti nāgo, na āgacchatīti nāgo …pe… evaṃ bhagavā na āgacchatīti nāgoti—
cnd22:7.2: **Kissa hetū**ti kissa hetu kiṃhetu kiṃkāraṇā kiṃnidānā kiṃpaccayāti—
cnd22:7.4: **Musā bhaṇe**ti musā bhaṇeyya katheyya dīpeyya vohareyya;
cnd22:7.5: **musā bhaṇe**ti mosavajjaṃ bhaṇeyya, musāvādaṃ bhaṇeyya, anariyavādaṃ bhaṇeyya.
cnd22:7.6: Idhekacco sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagato vā rājakulamajjhagato vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho—
cnd22:7.12: Iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā sampajānamusā bhāsati, idaṃ vuccati mosavajjaṃ.
cnd22:8.20: “musā mayā bhaṇitan”ti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ, vinidhāya khantiṃ, vinidhāya ruciṃ, vinidhāya saññaṃ, vinidhāya bhāvaṃ—
cnd22:8.22: Kissa hetu musā bhaṇeyya katheyya dīpeyya vohareyyāti—
cnd22:11.2: **Malan**ti rāgo malaṃ, doso malaṃ, moho malaṃ, māno malaṃ, diṭṭhi malaṃ, kileso malaṃ, sabbaduccaritaṃ malaṃ, sabbabhavagāmikammaṃ malaṃ.
cnd22:12.1: **Moho**ti yaṃ dukkhe aññāṇaṃ …pe… avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ.
cnd22:12.3: Malañca moho ca buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd22:13.57: idhekacco mānaṃ janeti jātiyā vā gottena vā kolaputtiyena vā vaṇṇapokkharatāya vā dhanena vā ajjhenena vā kammāyatanena vā sippāyatanena vā vijjāṭṭhānena vā sutena vā paṭibhānena vā aññataraññatarena vā vatthunā.
cnd22:13.58: Yo evarūpo māno maññanā maññitattaṃ unnati unnamo dhajo sampaggāho ketukamyatā cittassa—
cnd22:14.1: **Makkho**ti yo makkho makkhāyanā makkhāyitattaṃ niṭṭhuriyaṃ niṭṭhuriyakammaṃ—
cnd22:14.3: Buddhassa bhagavato māno ca makkho ca pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd22:15.2: **Handāhan**ti padasandhi padasaṃsaggo padapāripūrī akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatāpetaṃ—
cnd22:15.4: **Kittayissāmi giraṃ vaṇṇūpasañhitan**ti vaṇṇena upetaṃ samupetaṃ upāgataṃ samupāgataṃ upapannaṃ samupapannaṃ samannāgataṃ vācaṃ giraṃ byappathaṃ udīraṇaṃ kittayissāmi desessāmi paññapessāmi paṭṭhapessāmi vivarissāmi vibhajissāmi uttānīkarissāmi pakāsessāmīti—
cnd22:18.2: **Tamonudo**ti rāgatamaṃ dosatamaṃ mohatamaṃ mānatamaṃ diṭṭhitamaṃ kilesatamaṃ duccaritatamaṃ andhakaraṇaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ paññānirodhikaṃ vighātapakkhikaṃ anibbānasaṃvattanikaṃ nudi panudi pajahi vinodesi byantīakāsi anabhāvaṃ gamesi.
cnd22:19.28: **Lokantagū**ti bhagavā lokassa antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto … nibbānagato nibbānappatto.
cnd22:19.29: So vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo … jātimaraṇasaṃsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti—
cnd22:20.8: Paṭisandhikā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ—
cnd22:20.10: Bhagavā kammabhavañca paṭisandhikañca punabbhavaṃ ativatto atikkanto vītivattoti—
cnd22:21.4: Te āsavā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd22:21.6: **Sabbadukkhappahīno**ti sabbaṃ tassa paṭisandhikaṃ jātidukkhaṃ jarādukkhaṃ byādhidukkhaṃ maraṇadukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ …pe…
cnd22:21.7: diṭṭhibyasanadukkhaṃ pahīnaṃ samucchinnaṃ vūpasantaṃ paṭippassaddhaṃ abhabbuppattikaṃ ñāṇagginā daḍḍhaṃ.
cnd22:22.3: Vipassī bhagavā, sikhī bhagavā, vessabhū bhagavā, kakusandho bhagavā, koṇāgamano bhagavā, kassapo bhagavā.
cnd22:22.5: Bhagavāpi sakyamuni tesaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sadisanāmo sadisavhayoti—
cnd22:23.1: **Brahme upāsito me**ti so mayā bhagavā āsito upāsito payirupāsito paripucchito paripañhitoti—
cnd22:26.4: Dvikkhattuṃ jāyatīti dijo, mātukucchimhā ca aṇḍakosamhā ca.
cnd22:26.7: **Yathā kubbanakaṃ pahāyā**ti yathā dijo kubbanakaṃ parittavanakaṃ appaphalaṃ appabhakkhaṃ appodakaṃ pahāya jahitvā atikkamitvā samatikkamitvā vītivattetvā aññaṃ bahupphalaṃ bahubhakkhaṃ bahūdakaṃ mahantaṃ kānanaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ adhigaccheyya vindeyya paṭilabheyya, tasmiñca vanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ kappeyyāti—
cnd22:26.8: dijo yathā kubbanakaṃ pahāya bahupphalaṃ kānanaṃ āvaseyya.
cnd22:27.3: **Appadasse pahāyā**ti yo ca bāvarī brāhmaṇo ye caññe tassa ācariyā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upādāya appadassā parittadassā thokadassā omakadassā lāmakadassā chatukkadassā vā.
cnd22:27.4: Te appadasse parittadasse thokadasse omakadasse lāmakadasse chatukkadasse pahāya pajahitvā atikkamitvā samatikkamitvā vītivattetvā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ appamāṇadassaṃ aggadassaṃ seṭṭhadassaṃ viseṭṭhadassaṃ pāmokkhadassaṃ uttamadassaṃ pavaradassaṃ asamaṃ asamasamaṃ appaṭisamaṃ appaṭibhāgaṃ appaṭipuggalaṃ devātidevaṃ narāsabhaṃ purisasīhaṃ purisanāgaṃ purisājaññaṃ purisanisabhaṃ purisadhorayhaṃ dasabaladhāriṃ adhigacchiṃ vindiṃ paṭilabhiṃ.
cnd22:27.5: Yathā ca haṃso mahantaṃ mānasakaṃ vā saraṃ anotattaṃ vā dahaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ vā akkhobhaṃ amitodakaṃ jalarāsiṃ adhigaccheyya vindeyya paṭilabheyya, evameva buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ akkhobhaṃ amitatejaṃ pabhinnañāṇaṃ vivaṭacakkhuṃ paññāpabhedakusalaṃ adhigatapaṭisambhidaṃ catuvesārajjappattaṃ suddhādhimuttaṃ setapaccattaṃ advayabhāṇiṃ tādiṃ tathāpaṭiññaṃ aparittaṃ mahantaṃ gambhīraṃ appameyyaṃ duppariyogāhaṃ pahūtaratanaṃ sāgarasamaṃ chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgataṃ atulaṃ vipulaṃ appameyyaṃ, taṃ tādisaṃ pavadataṃ maggavādinaṃ merumiva nagānaṃ garuḷamiva dijānaṃ sīhamiva migānaṃ udadhimiva aṇṇavānaṃ adhigacchiṃ, taṃ satthāraṃ jinapavaraṃ mahesinti—
cnd22:27.6: evamahaṃ appadasse pahāya mahodadhiṃ haṃsoriva ajjhapatto.
cnd22:30.2: **Ye**ti yo ca bāvarī brāhmaṇo ye caññe tassa ācariyā, te sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ sakaṃ khantiṃ sakaṃ ruciṃ sakaṃ laddhiṃ sakaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ sakaṃ adhippāyaṃ byākaṃsu ācikkhiṃsu desayiṃsu paññapiṃsu paṭṭhapiṃsu vivariṃsu vibhajiṃsu uttānīakaṃsu pakāsesunti—
cnd22:31.1: **Huraṃ gotamasāsanā**ti huraṃ gotamasāsanā, paraṃ gotamasāsanā, pure gotamasāsanā, paṭhamataraṃ gotamasāsanā buddhasāsanā jinasāsanā tathāgatasāsanā arahantasāsanāti—
cnd22:32.1: **Iccāsi iti bhavissatī**ti evaṃ kira āsi, evaṃ kira bhavissatīti—
cnd22:33.1: **Sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihan**ti sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihaṃ itikirāya paramparāya piṭakasampadāya takkahetu nayahetu ākāraparivitakkena diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā na sāmaṃ sayamabhiññātaṃ na attapaccakkhaṃ dhammaṃ yaṃ kathayiṃsūti—
cnd22:34.1: **Sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanan**ti sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ vitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ saṅkappavaḍḍhanaṃ kāmavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ byāpādavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ ñātivitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ janapadavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ amarāvitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ parānudayatāpaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ anavaññattipaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhananti—
cnd22:37.2: **Eko**ti bhagavā pabbajjasaṅkhātena eko, adutiyaṭṭhena eko, taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko, ekantavītarāgoti eko, ekantavītadosoti eko, ekantavītamohoti eko, ekantanikkilesoti eko, ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti eko, eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko.
cnd22:38.2: Bhagavā daharova samāno susu kāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato paṭhamena vayasā akāmakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ assumukhānaṃ rodantānaṃ vilapantānaṃ ñātisaṅghaṃ sabbaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhaṃ chinditvā puttadārapalibodhaṃ chinditvā ñātipalibodhaṃ chinditvā mittāmaccapalibodhaṃ chinditvā sannidhipalibodhaṃ chinditvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā akiñcanabhāvaṃ upagantvā eko carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpeti.
cnd22:39.2: Evaṃ pabbajito samāno eko araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppāni.
cnd22:39.3: So eko gacchati, eko tiṭṭhati, eko nisīdati, eko seyyaṃ kappeti, eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati, eko abhikkamati, eko paṭikkamati, eko raho nisīdati, eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, eko carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpeti.
cnd22:40.2: So evaṃ eko adutiyo appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhirukkhamūle mahāpadhānaṃ padahanto māraṃ sasenaṃ kaṇhaṃ namuciṃ pamattabandhuṃ vidhamitvā taṇhājāliniṃ visaṭaṃ visattikaṃ pajahi vinodesi byantīakāsi anabhāvaṃ gamesi.
cnd22:44.2: Rāgassa pahīnattā ekantavītarāgoti eko, dosassa pahīnattā ekantavītadosoti eko, mohassa pahīnattā ekantavītamohoti eko, kilesānaṃ pahīnattā ekantanikkilesoti eko.
cnd22:48.1: Kathaṃ bhagavā eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko.
cnd22:48.2: Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṃsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi.
cnd22:48.3: Bhagavā tena bodhiñāṇena “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti bujjhi,
cnd22:48.6: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti bujjhi.
cnd22:48.7: Atha vā yaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ anubujjhitabbaṃ paṭibujjhitabbaṃ sambujjhitabbaṃ adhigantabbaṃ phassitabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ tena bodhiñāṇena bujjhi anubujjhi paṭibujjhi sambujjhi adhigacchi phassesi sacchākāsi.
cnd22:48.8: Evaṃ bhagavā eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko.
cnd22:49.1: **Tamonudo**ti bhagavā rāgatamaṃ dosatamaṃ mohatamaṃ diṭṭhitamaṃ kilesatamaṃ duccaritatamaṃ andhakaraṇaṃ acakkhukaraṇaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ paññānirodhikaṃ vighātapakkhikaṃ anibbānasaṃvattanikaṃ nudi panudi pajahi vinodesi byantīakāsi anabhāvaṃ gamesi.
cnd22:51.2: atha vā bhagavā sabbossukkapaṭippassaddhattā āsīno so vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātimaraṇasaṃsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti, evampi bhagavā āsīnoti—
cnd22:52.2: **Jutimā**ti jutimā matimā paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.
cnd22:52.3: **Pabhaṅkaro**ti pabhaṅkaro ālokakaro obhāsakaro dīpaṅkaro padīpakaro ujjotakaro pajjotakaroti—
cnd22:53.1: **Gotamo bhūripaññāṇo**ti gotamo bhūripaññāṇo ñāṇapaññāṇo paññādhajo paññāketu paññādhipateyyo vicayabahulo pavicayabahulo okkhāyanabahulo samokkhāyanadhammo vibhūtavihārī taccarito tabbahulo taggaruko tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto tadadhipateyyo.
cnd22:55.1: Evameva gotamo bhūripaññāṇo ñāṇapaññāṇo paññādhajo paññāketu paññādhipateyyo vicayabahulo pavicayabahulo okkhāyanabahulo samokkhāyanadhammo vibhūtavihārī taccarito tabbahulo taggaruko tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto tadadhipateyyoti—
cnd22:56.2: Bhagavā tāya pathavisamāya paññāya vipulāya vitthatāya samannāgato.
cnd22:56.4: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.
cnd22:56.5: Bhagavā imāya medhāya upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato, tasmā buddho sumedhasoti—
cnd22:59.2: **Yo**ti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāvaṃ.
cnd22:59.4: **Dhamman**ti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhāne …pe… ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ nibbānañca nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīakāsi pakāsesīti—
cnd22:60.1: **Sandiṭṭhikamakālikan**ti sandiṭṭhikaṃ akālikaṃ ehipassikaṃ opaneyyikaṃ paccattaṃ veditabbaṃ viññūhīti—
cnd22:60.3: Atha vā, yo diṭṭheva dhamme ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, tassa maggassa anantarā samanantarā adhigacchateva phalaṃ vindati paṭilabhatīti, evampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ.
cnd22:60.4: **Akālikan**ti yathā manussā kālikaṃ dhanaṃ datvā anantarā na labhanti kālaṃ āgamenti, nevāyaṃ dhammo.
cnd22:60.5: Yo diṭṭheva dhamme ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, tassa maggassa anantarā samanantarā adhigacchateva phalaṃ vindati paṭilabhati, na parattha na paraloke, evaṃ akālikanti—
cnd22:61.3: **Taṇhakkhayan**ti taṇhakkhayaṃ rāgakkhayaṃ dosakkhayaṃ mohakkhayaṃ gatikkhayaṃ upapattikkhayaṃ paṭisandhikkhayaṃ bhavakkhayaṃ saṃsārakkhayaṃ vaṭṭakkhayaṃ.
cnd22:61.4: **Anītikan**ti **īti** vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca.
cnd22:61.5: Ītippahānaṃ ītivūpasamaṃ ītipaṭinissaggaṃ ītipaṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti—
cnd22:62.3: **Natthi upamā**ti upamā natthi, upanidhā natthi, sadisaṃ natthi, paṭibhāgo natthi na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati.
cnd22:62.4: **Kvacī**ti kvaci kimhici katthaci ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā ajjhattabahiddhā vāti—
cnd22:65.1: **Kiṃ nu tamhā vippavasasī**ti kiṃ nu buddhamhā vippavasasi apesi apagacchasi vinā hosīti—
cnd22:66.1: **Muhuttamapi piṅgiyā**ti muhuttampi khaṇampi layampi vayampi addhampīti—
cnd22:67.1: **Gotamā bhūripaññāṇā**ti gotamā bhūripaññāṇā ñāṇapaññāṇā paññādhajā paññāketumhā paññādhipateyyamhā vicayabahulā pavicayabahulā okkhāyanabahulā samokkhāyanadhammā vibhūtavihārimhā taccaritā tabbahulā taggarukā tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbhārā tadadhimuttā tadadhipateyyamhāti—
cnd22:68.2: Bhagavā tāya pathavisamāya paññāya vipulāya vitthatāya samannāgato.
cnd22:68.4: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.
cnd22:68.5: Bhagavā imāya medhāya paññāya upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato, tasmā buddho sumedhasoti—
cnd22:71.2: tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāvaṃ.

cnd22:72.3: Atha vā, yo diṭṭheva dhamme ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, tassa maggassa anantarā samanantarā adhigacchateva phalaṃ vindati paṭilabhatīti—
cnd22:72.5: **Akālikan**ti yathā manussā kālikaṃ dhanaṃ datvā anantarā na labhanti, kālaṃ āgamenti, nevāyaṃ dhammo.
cnd22:72.6: Yo diṭṭheva dhamme ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti;
cnd22:72.7: tassa maggassa anantarā samanantarā adhigacchateva phalaṃ vindati paṭilabhati, na parattha na paraloke, evaṃ akālikanti—
cnd22:73.3: **Taṇhakkhayan**ti taṇhakkhayaṃ rāgakkhayaṃ dosakkhayaṃ mohakkhayaṃ gatikkhayaṃ upapattikkhayaṃ paṭisandhikkhayaṃ bhavakkhayaṃ saṃsārakkhayaṃ vaṭṭakkhayaṃ.
cnd22:73.4: **Anītikan**ti **īti** vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca.
cnd22:73.5: Ītippahānaṃ ītivūpasamaṃ ītipaṭinissaggaṃ ītipaṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti—
cnd22:74.3: **Natthi upamā**ti upamā natthi, upanidhā natthi, sadisaṃ natthi, paṭibhāgo natthi na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati.
cnd22:74.4: **Kvacī**ti kvaci kimhici katthaci ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā ajjhattabahiddhā vāti—
cnd22:77.1: **Nāhaṃ tamhā vippavasāmī**ti nāhaṃ buddhamhā vippavasāmi apemi apagacchāmi vinā homīti—
cnd22:78.1: **Muhuttamapi brāhmaṇā**ti muhuttampi khaṇampi layampi vayampi addhampīti muhuttamapi.
cnd22:79.1: **Gotamā bhūripaññāṇā**ti gotamā bhūripaññāṇā ñāṇapaññāṇā paññādhajā paññāketumhā paññādhipateyyamhā vicayabahulā pavicayabahulā okkhāyanabahulā samokkhāyanadhammā vibhūtavihārimhā taccaritā tabbahulā taggarukā tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbhārā tadadhimuttā tadadhipateyyamhāti—
cnd22:80.2: Bhagavā tāya pathavisamāya paññāya vipulāya vitthatāya samannāgato.
cnd22:80.4: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.
cnd22:80.5: Bhagavā imāya medhāya paññāya upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato.
cnd22:83.1: **Yo me dhammamadesesī**ti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāvaṃ.
cnd22:83.3: **Dhamman**ti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhāne cattāro sammappadhāne cattāro iddhipāde pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅge ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ nibbānañca nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīakāsi pakāsesīti—
cnd22:84.1: **Sandiṭṭhikamakālikan**ti sandiṭṭhikaṃ akālikaṃ ehipassikaṃ opaneyyikaṃ paccattaṃ veditabbaṃ viññūhīti, evaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ.
cnd22:84.2: Atha vā yo diṭṭheva dhamme ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, tassa maggassa anantarā samanantarā adhigacchateva phalaṃ vindati paṭilabhatīti, evampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ.
cnd22:84.3: **Akālikan**ti yathā manussā kālikaṃ dhanaṃ datvā anantarā na labhanti, kālaṃ āgamenti, nevāyaṃ dhammo.
cnd22:84.4: Yo diṭṭheva dhamme ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, tassa maggassa anantarā samanantarā adhigacchateva phalaṃ vindati paṭilabhati, na parattha na paraloke, evaṃ akālikanti—
cnd22:85.3: **Taṇhakkhayan**ti taṇhakkhayaṃ rāgakkhayaṃ dosakkhayaṃ mohakkhayaṃ gatikkhayaṃ upapattikkhayaṃ paṭisandhikkhayaṃ bhavakkhayaṃ saṃsārakkhayaṃ vaṭṭakkhayaṃ.
cnd22:85.4: **Anītikan**ti **īti** vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca.
cnd22:86.3: **Natthi upamā**ti upamā natthi, upanidhā natthi, sadisaṃ natthi, paṭibhāgo natthi na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati.
cnd22:86.4: **Kvacī**ti kvaci kimhici katthaci ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā ajjhattabahiddhā vāti—
cnd22:89.1: **Passāmi naṃ manasā cakkhunāvā**ti yathā cakkhumā puriso āloke rūpagatāni passeyya dakkheyya olokeyya nijjhāyeyya upaparikkheyya, evamevāhaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ manasā passāmi dakkhāmi olokemi nijjhāyāmi upaparikkhāmīti—
cnd22:90.1: **Rattindivaṃ brāhmaṇa appamatto**ti rattiñca divā ca buddhānussatiṃ manasā bhāvento appamattoti—
cnd22:91.2: **Namassamāno**ti kāyena vā namassamāno, vācāya vā namassamāno, cittena vā namassamāno, anvatthapaṭipattiyā vā namassamāno, dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā vā namassamāno sakkāramāno garukāramāno mānayamāno pūjayamāno rattindivaṃ vivasemi atināmemi atikkamemīti—
cnd22:92.1: **Teneva maññāmi avippavāsan**ti tāya buddhānussatiyā bhāvento avippavāsoti taṃ maññāmi, avippavuṭṭhoti taṃ maññāmi jānāmi.
cnd22:92.2: Evaṃ jānāmi evaṃ ājānāmi evaṃ vijānāmi evaṃ paṭivijānāmi evaṃ paṭivijjhāmīti—
cnd22:94.1: **Saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca,**
cnd22:95.1: **Saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati cā**ti.
cnd22:95.2: **Saddhā**ti yā ca bhagavantaṃ ārabbha saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo saddhā saddhindriyaṃ saddhābalaṃ.
cnd22:95.3: **Pītī**ti yā bhagavantaṃ ārabbha pīti pāmojjaṃ modanā āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti tuṭṭhi odagyaṃ attamanatā cittassa.
cnd22:95.4: **Mano**ti yañca bhagavantaṃ ārabbha cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjā manoviññāṇadhātu.
cnd22:95.5: **Satī**ti yā bhagavantaṃ ārabbha sati anussati sammāsatīti—
cnd22:95.6: saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca.
cnd22:96.1: **Nāpentime gotamasāsanamhā**ti ime cattāro dhammā gotamasāsanā buddhasāsanā jinasāsanā tathāgatasāsanā arahantasāsanā nāpenti na gacchanti na vijahanti na vināsentīti—
cnd22:97.2: **Yaṃ yaṃ disan**ti puratthimaṃ vā disaṃ pacchimaṃ vā disaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ vā disaṃ uttaraṃ vā disaṃ vajati gacchati kamati abhikkamati.
cnd22:97.3: **Bhūripañño**ti bhūripañño mahāpañño tikkhapañño puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño nibbedhikapañño.
cnd22:97.5: Bhagavā tāya pathavisamāya paññāya vipulāya vitthatāya samannāgatoti—
cnd22:98.1: **Sa tena teneva natohamasmī**ti so yena buddho tena teneva nato tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto tadadhipateyyoti—
cnd22:99.1: “Saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca,
cnd22:101.1: **Jiṇṇassa me dubbalathāmakassā**ti jiṇṇassa vuḍḍhassa mahallakassa addhagatassa vayoanuppattassa.
cnd22:102.1: **Teneva kāyo na paleti tatthā**ti kāyo yena buddho tena na paleti na vajati na gacchati nātikkamatīti—
cnd22:103.1: **Saṅkappayantāya vajāmi niccan**ti saṅkappagamanena vitakkagamanena ñāṇagamanena paññāgamanena buddhigamanena vajāmi gacchāmi atikkamāmīti—
cnd22:104.2: **Mano**ti yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ …pe… tajjā manoviññāṇadhātu.
cnd22:104.3: **Mano hi me brāhmaṇa tena yutto**ti mano yena buddho tena yutto payutto saṃyuttoti—
cnd22:104.4: mano hi me brāhmaṇa tena yutto.
cnd22:105.4: Mano hi me brāhmaṇa tena yutto”ti.
cnd22:107.2: **Paṅke sayāno**ti kāmapaṅke kāmakaddame kāmakilese kāmabaḷise kāmapariḷāhe kāmapalibodhe semāno sayamāno vasamāno āvasamāno parivasamāno ti—
cnd22:107.102: diṭṭhibyasanena dukkhena phandamāno pariphandamāno pavedhamāno sampavedhamānoti—
cnd22:108.1: **Dīpā dīpaṃ upallavin**ti satthārato satthāraṃ dhammakkhānato dhammakkhānaṃ gaṇato gaṇaṃ diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhiṃ paṭipadāya paṭipadaṃ maggato maggaṃ pallaviṃ upallaviṃ sampallavinti—
cnd22:109.2: **Athā**ti padasandhi padasaṃsaggo padapāripūrī akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatāpetaṃ—
cnd22:110.6: sabbasaṃsārapathaṃ tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivatto,
cnd22:110.12: Te āsavā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd22:113.1: **Yathā ahū vakkali muttasaddho, bhadrāvudho āḷavigotamo cā**ti yathā vakkalitthero saddho saddhāgaruko saddhāpubbaṅgamo saddhādhimutto saddhādhipateyyo arahattappatto, yathā bhadrāvudho thero saddho saddhāgaruko saddhāpubbaṅgamo saddhādhimutto saddhādhipateyyo arahattappatto, yathā āḷavigotamo thero saddho saddhāgaruko saddhāpubbaṅgamo saddhādhimutto saddhādhipateyyo arahattappattoti—
cnd22:113.2: yathā ahū vakkali muttasaddho bhadrāvudho āḷavigotamo ca.
cnd22:114.1: **Evameva tvampi pamuñcassu saddhan**ti evameva tvaṃ saddhaṃ muñcassu pamuñcassu sampamuñcassu adhimuñcassu okappehi.
cnd22:114.2: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti saddhaṃ muñcassu pamuñcassu sampamuñcassu adhimuñcassu okappehi.
cnd22:114.4: “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti saddhaṃ muñcassu pamuñcassu sampamuñcassu adhimuñcassu okappehi …pe…
cnd22:114.5: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti saddhaṃ muñcassu pamuñcassu, sampamuñcassu adhimuñcassu okappehīti—
cnd22:115.1: **Gamissasi tvaṃ piṅgiya maccudheyyassa pāran**ti maccudheyyaṃ vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca.
cnd22:115.2: Maccudheyyassa pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ, yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
cnd22:115.3: **Gamissasi tvaṃ piṅgiya maccudheyyassa pāran**ti tvaṃ pāraṃ gamissasi, pāraṃ adhigamissasi, pāraṃ phassissasi, pāraṃ sacchikarissasīti—
cnd22:118.1: **Esa bhiyyo pasīdāmī**ti esa bhiyyo pasīdāmi, bhiyyo bhiyyo saddahāmi, bhiyyo bhiyyo okappemi, bhiyyo bhiyyo adhimuccāmi;
cnd22:118.2: “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdāmi, bhiyyo bhiyyo saddahāmi, bhiyyo bhiyyo okappemi, bhiyyo bhiyyo adhimuccāmi;
cnd22:118.5: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdāmi, bhiyyo bhiyyo saddahāmi, bhiyyo bhiyyo okappemi, bhiyyo bhiyyo adhimuccāmīti—
cnd22:119.2: **Munī**ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ …pe… saṅgajālamaticca so muni.
cnd22:119.3: **Sutvāna munino vaco**ti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ sutvāna uggahetvāna upadhārayitvāna upalakkhayitvānāti—
cnd22:120.4: Tāni chadanāni buddhassa bhagavato vivaṭāni viddhaṃsitāni samugghāṭitāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭippassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni.
cnd22:120.6: **Buddho**ti yo so bhagavā …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti—
cnd22:121.2: **Akhilo**ti rāgo khilo, doso khilo, moho khilo, kodho khilo, upanāho …pe… sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā khilā.
cnd22:121.3: Te khilā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd22:122.4: Idhekaccassa buddhavacanaṃ pariyāputaṃ hoti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
cnd22:123.2: Idhekacco paripucchitā hoti atthe ca ñāye ca lakkhaṇe ca kāraṇe ca ṭhānāṭhāne ca.
cnd22:124.2: Idhekaccassa adhigatā honti cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri sāmaññaphalāni, catasso paṭisambhidāyo, cha abhiññāyo.
cnd22:124.3: Tassa attho ñāto, dhammo ñāto, nirutti ñātā.
cnd22:124.4: Atthe ñāte attho paṭibhāti, dhamme ñāte dhammo paṭibhāti, niruttiyā ñātāya nirutti paṭibhāti.
cnd22:124.6: Bhagavā imāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato.
cnd22:124.8: Yassa pariyatti natthi, paripucchā natthi, adhigamo natthi, kiṃ tassa paṭibhāyissatīti—
cnd22:127.5: Sammutidevā vuccanti rājāno ca rājakumāro ca deviyo ca.
cnd22:127.8: Upapattidevā vuccanti cātumahārājikā devā tāvatiṃsā devā …pe… brahmakāyikā devā, ye ca devā taduttari.
cnd22:127.11: Visuddhidevā vuccanti tathāgatā tathāgatasāvakā arahanto khīṇāsavā, ye ca paccekasambuddhā.
cnd22:127.13: Bhagavā sammutideve adhidevāti abhiññāya upapattideve adhidevāti abhiññāya, visuddhideve adhidevāti abhiññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti—
cnd22:128.1: **Sabbaṃ vedi paroparan**ti bhagavā attano ca paresañca adhidevakare dhamme vedi aññāsi aphassi paṭivijjhi.
cnd22:128.3: Sammāpaṭipadā anulomapaṭipadā apaccanīkapaṭipadā anvatthapaṭipadā dhammānudhammapaṭipadā sīlesu paripūrakāritā indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo satisampajaññaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā …pe… ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
cnd22:129.4: Evaṃ bhagavā attano ca paresañca adhidevakare dhamme vedi aññāsi aphassi paṭivijjhīti—
cnd22:130.1: **Pañhānantakaro satthā**ti bhagavā pārāyanikapañhānaṃ antakaro pariyantakaro paricchedakaro parivaṭumakaro;
cnd22:130.18: Yathā satthavāho satthe kantāraṃ tāreti, corakantāraṃ tāreti, vāḷakantāraṃ tāreti, dubbhikkhakantāraṃ tāreti, nirudakakantāraṃ tāreti uttāreti nittāreti patāreti, khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpeti;
cnd22:130.19: evameva bhagavā satthavāho satte kantāraṃ tāreti,
cnd22:131.1: Atha vā bhagavā netā vinetā anunetā paññāpetā nijjhāpetā pekkhatā pasādetāti, evaṃ bhagavā satthavāho.
cnd22:131.2: Atha vā bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū maggavidū maggakovido maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatāti, evampi bhagavā satthavāhoti—
cnd22:132.1: **Kaṅkhīnaṃ paṭijānatan**ti sakaṅkhā āgantvā nikkaṅkhā sampajjanti, sallekhā āgantvā nillekhā sampajjanti, sadveḷhakā āgantvā nidveḷhakā sampajjanti, savicikicchā āgantvā nibbicikicchā sampajjanti, sarāgā āgantvā vītarāgā sampajjanti, sadosā āgantvā vītadosā sampajjanti, samohā āgantvā vītamohā sampajjanti, sakilesā āgantvā nikkilesā sampajjantīti—
cnd22:135.2: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
cnd22:135.3: **Asaṃhīran**ti rāgena dosena mohena kodhena upanāhena makkhena paḷāsena issāya macchariyena māyāya sāṭheyyena thambhena sārambhena mānena atimānena madena pamādena sabbakilesehi sabbaduccaritehi sabbapariḷāhehi sabbāsavehi sabbadarathehi sabbasantāpehi sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārehi asaṃhāriyaṃ nibbānaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti—
cnd22:136.3: Nibbānassa na uppādo paññāyati, vayo natthi, na tassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati.
cnd22:137.3: **Natthi upamā**ti upamā natthi, upanidhā natthi, sadisaṃ natthi, paṭibhāgo natthi, na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati.
cnd22:137.4: **Kvacī**ti kvaci kimhici katthaci ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā ajjhattabahiddhā vāti—
cnd22:138.2: **Addhā**ti ekaṃsavacanaṃ nissaṃsayavacanaṃ nikkaṅkhavacanaṃ advejjhavacanaṃ adveḷhakavacanaṃ niyogavacanaṃ apaṇṇakavacanaṃ aviraddhavacanaṃ avatthāpanavacanametaṃ—
cnd22:138.7: **Etthā**ti nibbāne kaṅkhā natthi, vicikicchā natthi, dveḷhakaṃ natthi, saṃsayo natthi, na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīno samucchinno vūpasanto paṭippassaddho abhabbuppattiko ñāṇagginā daḍḍhoti—
